data.title: Nice Work If You Can Get It
data.meta_description: CVRep presents George & Ira Gershwin's Nice Work If You Can Get It April 10–21, 2024. Book by Joe DiPietro.
data.text:
CVRep presents George & Ira Gershwin's Nice Work If You Can Get It April 10–21, 2024. Book by Joe DiPietro. Inspired by Material by Guy Bolton and P.G. Wodehouse.

There’s a “Somebody I’m Longing to See” and they’re “S’wonderful” with a “Fascinating Rhythm”. Before you, “Call The Whole Thing Off”, get the “Sweet and Lowdown” of this “Lady Be Good” musical that will hit the CVRep stage with Gershwin songs you’ll be humming the whole way home. In a brand-new take on the classic 1920s musical farce, this screwball comedy features romance, high-spirited production numbers, and a Tony Award winning script that pokes fun at class snobbery in the prohibition era.

There will be two preview performances on Wednesday, April 10, 2024 at 2 pm & 7 pm.

Show Times

Wednesdays 2 pm & 7 pm

Thursdays 7 pm

Fridays 7 pm

Saturdays 2 pm & 7 pm

Sundays 2pm

Click Here for Season Subscriptions

All 2023/2024 Season Subscriptions are $395

Preview Performances – Wednesday Matinee/Wednesday Evening are $305

Opening Night & Reception is $445

Important Dates

July 1 – July 14: Early-Bird Season Subscription Renewal Period

During the renewal period, we will process renewal orders for existing 2022/2023 subscribers making no changes to their existing subscriptions.

July 15: Change Requests to 2022-2023 Subscription Processing Period

We will begin processing the renewal subscriptions needing changes, such as a new performance day and / or different seats.

August 1: New Subscription Processing Period / Flex Packages on Sale for Current Donors.

Season Subscription and Flex Package sales are open to current CVRep donors who have given $100 or more in 2023.

August 16: New Season Subscriptions / Flex Packages on Sale to General Public

Season Subscriptions and Flex Packages go on sale to everyone.

September 1: Season Subscription holder and Flex Package Exchange period begins.

For Season Subscribers who may need to exchange a ticket for a performance, we can begin to fulfill those exchange requests. We can also begin to start processing Flex Ticket Vouchers at this time.

September 1: Single Tickets Public on Sale

Single tickets go on sale to the General Public.

BOX OFFICE HOURS:
